name: Square Adventure (Demo)
description:
To move:

Left - Right - Down

To jump:

Up

To get to the next level, you have to get to the red ball. Do not touch the light grey, or it will kill you.Some levels include teleporting. To teleport, get to the dark grey.

There are some bugs and glitches in the game so no need to complain, I will look into it and try to fix it.

Also try not to cheat please, do it properly.
